Detailed Description

Class for downloading and cleaning html code Class contain methods to download and clean html code from given urls.

It has also tools for parsing html code.

std::string HTTPDownloader::cleanhtml ( const std::string &  html)

Clean html.

That means close open tags and reformat dirty html code. Detailed informations cout be found on libtidy library website

Parameters
html- string with html code to clean
Returns
Cleand html code.

bool HTTPDownloader::download ( const std::string &  url,
std::string &  output 
)

Download html code Downloads html text from given website, waits 5 seconds for response otherwise returns false.

Parameters
[in]url- url address of website to curl
[out]output- html code from given url will be saved here
Returns
true if everything went right, false if not
